def sum_to_n(n: int):
    """sum_to_n is a function that sums numbers from 1 to n.
    >>> sum_to_n(30)
    465
    >>> sum_to_n(100)
    5050
    >>> sum_to_n(5)
    15
    >>> sum_to_n(10)
    55
    >>> sum_to_n(1)
    1
    """
    #-----------------------------
    # Return an array of the right length, where the
    # number of elements in the leftmost element
    # is not less than the number of elements in the rightmost
    # element.
    return ([[sum(i) for i in range(len(n))] for n in range(n))])
